content: get spooky with my crochet ghost coaster pattern a perfect way to decorate for halloween or all year round if you love the spooky season **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream white cotton yarn ▢lily sugar n cream black cotton yarn ▢5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase - increase slip_stitch - slip_stitch
